c_00000001.name: Alexander
c_00000001.preperation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

c_00000002.name: Americano
c_00000002.preperation: Mix the ingredients directly in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice-cubes, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.
